item.title: Go binary search tree
item.description: tags Go Programming Software Engineering Requirements # Sorted array of lenght N Performance # Say an array contains N (search space o N) elements, and we divide N/2, getting a search space of N/2, how many steps do we need until we get down to just one an array of 1 element. O(log2 n) problem. Implementation # Can be implemented recursively or non-recursively.
